name: 郭宏源
objective:
1. 資料表示法：定點系統，浮點系統，2. 運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3. 指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制，微程式控制單元設計，4. 記憶系統：記憶體之層次 ，虛擬記憶體，快取記憶體，5. 處理器架構
1.Data representation: Fixed Point System, Floating Point System
2. Arithmetic work: fixed-point addition, subtraction, multiplication and division, fast calculations, floating point calculations
3. Instruction and control: introduction to various instructions, interrupts, and hardware control, Microprogramming
4.Memory organization: Memory Hierarchy, Virtual memory, Cache Memory
5.Processor organization
schedule:
01.Introduction 
02.Data Representation in Computer Systems
03.Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic
04.Designing Circuits
05.MARIE: An Introduction to a Simple Computer
06.Memory Organization and Addressing
07.A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures
08.Instruction Types
09.Midterm Exam.
10.Memory
11.Input/Output Systems
12.System Software
13.Alternative Architectures
14.RISC Machines
15.Topics in Embedded Systems
16.Embedded Operating Systems
17.Performance Measurement and Analysis
18.Final Exam.
